question.content: Any solid plans on age-locked interactions or chat capabilities? The game seems like it could easily cater to children as well as us adults looking for a game to relax to after work. You can't control the actions of the child of course, but something in place to protect them would be good.

answer.content: We definitely care about keeping the community safe - while we might not do something like automatic age restrictions, and a lot of what we aspire to will take some time to build, we do recognize the need for different social spaces to necessitate different restrictions, and for different players to have different needs.
